title: Flan`s mod问题
author: 凋零、
txt_content:

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... &highlight=flan
这是最新的，有加特林机枪

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content: 你还要去下XX包才会有那些东西

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 把flan的mod文件（除主程序）放到flan文件夹，我以前也这样2过，然后报废了一个存档

replies.txt_content:

把flan的mod文件（除主程序）放到flan文件夹，我以前也这样2过，然后报废了一个存档 ...
